string.name: api_ok
string.context: Label to show that an SDK operation has been complete successfully.

string.name: api_einternal
string.context: Label to show that an Internal error occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_eargs
string.context: Label to show that an error of Invalid argument occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_eagain
string.context: Label to show that a request error occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_eratelimit
string.context: Label to show that the rate limit has been reached during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_efailed
string.context: Label to show that a SDK operation has failed permanently.

string.name: api_etoomany_ec_download
string.context: Error shown when terms of service are breached during download.

string.name: api_etoomay
string.context: Label to show that an error for multiple concurrent connections or transfers occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_erange
string.context: Label to show that an error of Out of range occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_eexpired
string.context: State to indicate something has expired (achivements of business status account for instance)

string.name: api_enoent
string.context: Label to show that an error related with a resource Not found occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_ecircular_ec_upload
string.context: Label to show that an error related with a circular upload procedures occurs recursivity during a SDK operation.

resources.string: Não foi possível fazer a transferência devido a uma estrutura de diretório recursiva

string.name: api_ecircular
string.context: Label to show that an error related with a circular linkage occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_eaccess
string.context: Label to show that an error related with an denied access occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_eexist
string.context: Label to show that an error related with an existent resource occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_eincomplete
string.context: Label to show that an error related with an Incomplete SDK operation.

string.name: api_ekey
string.context: Label to show that an error related with the decryption process of a node occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_esid
string.context: Label to show that an error related with a bad session ID occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_eblocked_ec_import_ec_download
string.context: Error shown when download a file that has violated ToS/AUP.

resources.string: Não acessível por infringir os termos de serviço

string.name: api_eblocked
string.context: Label to show that an error related with a blocked account occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_eoverquota
string.context: Label to show that an error related with an over quota occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_etempunavail
string.context: Label to show that an error related with a temporary problem occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_etoomanyconnections
string.context: Label to show that an error related with too many connections occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_ewrite
string.context: Label to show that an error related with an write error occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_eread
string.context: Label to show that an error related with an read error occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_eappkey
string.context: Label to show that an error related with an invalid or missing application key occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_essl
string.context: Error shown when SSL check has failed

string.name: api_egoingoverquota
string.context: Label shown when current account does not have enough quota to complete the operation

string.name: api_emfarequired
string.context: Label to show that an error of Multi-factor authentication required occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_emasteronly
string.context: Label to show that an error of Access denied for users occurs during a SDK operation.

resources.string: Acesso negado para usuários sem permissão de administrador

string.name: api_ebusinesspastdue
string.context: A dialog title shown to users when their business account is expired.

string.name: payment_ecard
string.context: Label to show that an error of Credit card rejected occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: payment_ebilling
string.context: Label to show that an error of Billing failed occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: payment_efraud
string.context: Label to show that an error of Rejected by fraud protection occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: payment_etoomay
string.context: Message shown when the SDK is waiting for the server to complete a request due to a rate limit (API error -4) - (String as short as possible).

string.name: payment_ebalance
string.context: Label to show that an error of Balance occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: payment_egeneric_api_error_unknown
string.context: Label to show that an error related with an unknown error occurs during a SDK operation.

string.name: api_error_http
string.context: Label to show that an error related with an HTTP error occurs during a SDK operation.
